contentrichtext.text: {{otheruses|Yutaka (disambiguation)}} '''''Yutaka''''', founded as the Shinsei Manufacturing, was a Japanese company that operated in the field of video game publishing. It changed its name and joined the [[Bandai Group]] in January 1990. Yutaka joined [[Popy]] in 2003 after a merger and disappeared. ==Games== {{Expand list|date=December 2011}} {{see also|Category:Yutaka games}} ===Famicom=== *''[[Karakuri Kengoden Musashi Lord: Karakuri Jin Shissouru]]'' *''[[Hyokkori Hyoutan Shima: Nazo no Kaizokusen]]'' *''[[Last Armageddon]]'' *''[[Magical Princess Minky Momo|Mahou no Princess Minky Momo]]: Remember Dream'' *''[[Ushio to Tora: Shin'en no Daiyō]]'' *''[[Nakayo Shito Issho]]'' ===Super Famicom=== *''[[3x3 Eyes Seimakourinden]]'' *''[[Dear Boys]]'' *''[[Kachō Kōsaku Shima: Super Business Adventure]]'' *''[[Logos Panic]]'' *''[[Shin Seikoku: La Wares]]'' *''[[Supapoon]]'' *''[[Ultra League|Ultra League: Moero! Soccer Daikessen!!]]'' ===Game Boy=== *''[[Karakuri Kengoden Musashi Lord]]'' *''[[TV Champion (video game)|TV Champion]]'' *''[[Goldfish Warning!|Kingyo Chūihō! Wapiko no Waku Waku Stamp Rally!]]'' ==References== *[http://www.gamefaqs.com/features/company/73441.html List of Yutaka games] at [[GameFAQs]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Yutaka (Video Games)}} [[Category:Bandai]] [[Category:Video game companies of Japan]] [[Category:Video game publishers]] {{japan-videogame-company-stub}}
